branchCategory.name: IZTB, Bar Ionizer
branchCategory.description: <p>The IZTB bar ionizer is the ion emitting component of the IZT static control system.  This component is available for individual configuration as an additional bar to existing 1-bar system, or as a replacement.  A complete system consists of 1 to 4 bars, a single controller, and a power supply module for each bar, plus cables and accessories as required.  These components can also be ordered separately.</p>

relatedProductsItem.name: IZT40/41/42, Bar Type Ionizer, Separate Controller and Power Supply Module
